예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) The flood was consequent on heavy rain. 2) Consequent damages were reported.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: consequent 뜻? → 결과로, Q2: 전치사? consequent ___ → on, Q3: 명사형? → consequence

예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) It rained heavily; consequently, the match was canceled.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: consequently 의미? → 그 결과, Q2: 유사어? → therefore, Q3: 품사? → 부사

핵심 개념 요약(한 문장): 원래 상태로 되돌리거나 다시 사용 가능하게 함.
예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) The government restored the old palace. 2) His confidence was restored.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: restore 뜻? → 복구하다, Q2: 명사형? → restoration, Q3: collocation? → restore order

예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) The police reconstructed the crime scene. 2) They reconstructed the bridge.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: reconstruct 뜻? → 재구성, Q2: 반의어? → destroy, Q3: 명사형? → reconstruction

예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) The restoration of the building took years. 2) Restoration of peace was achieved.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: restoration 품사? → 명사, Q2: 의미? → 복구, Q3: collocation? → restoration of peace

예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) He overcame great adversity. 2) Adversity builds character.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: adversity 뜻? → 역경, Q2: 형용사형? → adverse, Q3: collocation? → overcome adversity

예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) Many families face economic hardship. 2) He endured many hardships.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: hardship 의미? → 고난, Q2: 반의어? → comfort, Q3: collocation? → economic hardship

콜로케이션(뜻 포함): refer to a book, refer to a problem
예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) Please refer to page 10. 2) He referred to the data in his speech.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: refer 전치사? → to, Q2: 명사형? → reference, Q3: 의미? → 언급, 참고하다

예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) The wind scattered the leaves. 2) People scattered in all directions.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: scatter 뜻? → 흩뿌리다, Q2: 반의어? → gather, Q3: collocation? → scatter seeds

핵심 개념 요약(한 문장): 묶여 있던 것이 사방으로 퍼지거나 흩어짐.
예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) Police dispersed the crowd. 2) The fog slowly dispersed.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: disperse 뜻? → 흩어지다, Q2: 유사어? → scatter, Q3: 군중 해산 표현? → disperse a crowd
